tokens.text: returns number of equipped armor pieces for an entity f...

description: Returns the number of equipped armor pieces for an entity from 0 to 5, not counting items held in hands. (To query for hand slots, use `query.is_item_equipped` or `query.is_item_name_any`).

generated_doNotEdit.title: Equipment Count
generated_doNotEdit.description: Returns the number of equipped armor pieces for an actor from 0 to 5, not counting items held in hands. (To query for hand slots, use query.is_item_equipped or query.is_item_name_any).
